lines.text: Come on out or I'm comin' in after ya.
You better come shootin'! That's the only way you'll take me!
If he's in love, it's a secret and he knows how to keep a secret.
Like it? He'd like a sizzlin' red hot mustard plaster if he thought you'd made it.
Pretty words come easily to your lips.
Only because your pretty lips inspire them.
